drink_info: add lime juice,salt,mint leaves to the old fashioned glass

pour tequila,Triple sec into the glass
add white wine,raspberry,pear,cinnamon,cider,apple to the bucket
add crushed ice to the glass
add water,lemon juice to the collins glass
add club soda,blueberry to the glass
add mint leaves,lemon,honey to the shaker
add club soda to the shaker
strain into the old fashioned glass
fill up the glass with club soda
fill up the old fashioned glass with ice
fill up the old fashioned glass with ice
add strawberry,lime sherbet,lime juice,ice,honeydew melon to the blender
strain into the irish coffee glass
add ice,coconut cream,apple juice to the blender
garnish with pinapple wedges , cocktail cherry
fill up the shaker with ice cubes
add lime juice,cream,coconut cream,apple juice to the shaker
fill up the sour glass with crushed ice
fill up the glass with ice
fill up the shaker with ice
pour pineapple juice,coconut liqueur,half & half,strawberry liqueur,white rum into the shaker
garnish with cocktail cherry , pinapple wedges
fill up the collins glass with ice
pour ginger ale,lemon juice,sugar syrup into the glass
add lemon juice,honey,club soda to the blender
add ice to the collins glass

add lemon juice to the blender

fill up the collins glass with ice
pour orange juice,grenadine into the glass

fill up the shaker with ice
pour Crème de Cacao,vodka,irish cream into the shaker

pour dark rum,champagne into the glass
fill up the shaker with ice cubes

fill up the glass with champagne
drop the sugar cube into the champagne glass
Soak the sugar cube with a few drops of Angostura bitters.
fill up the glass with champagne

pour blackcurrant liqueur into the champagne glass
fill up the glass with champagne
